javax.microedition.contactless
Class ContactlessException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          javax.microedition.contactless.ContactlessException
Direct Known Subclasses:
VisualTagCodingException
public class ContactlessException
extends java.lang.Exception

This ContactlessException is thrown when an unsupported operation is attempted. Examples of such operations include:

  • trying to invoke methods on a target that is not supported by the API implementation
  • trying to invoke a method that is not supported by the target
  • trying to use symbology that is not supported by the API implementation

Version:
1.0
Author:
Nokia Corporation
